```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_csv("Data/Tenured.csv")


```

Get the top 50 most tenured names, removing duplicate names

```{r}
DirectorList <- data %>%
  arrange(desc(YearsOnBoard)) %>%
  distinct(Name, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  slice_head(n = 50)

withDuplicates <- data %>%
  arrange(desc(YearsOnBoard)) %>%
  slice_head(n = 75)

onlyDuplicates <- withDuplicates %>% 
  group_by(Name) %>%
  filter(n() > 1) %>%
  ungroup()

```
